ad_text: Wooldridge Construction Group Sponsored Are you ready to join a company that will make you feel like family? Wooldridge Transportation Group is currently seeking 1 Class A/B Driver to operate our Roll off Dumpster Truck. As a Leader and trendsetter in the logistics world. Our company is expanding, and we want YOU to be a part of it. The hours are Monday- Friday 6:00 am - 5:00 pm home nights and weekends. $28 an hour 4-day work week Please contact Mark 812-246-1859. Operator Responsibilities: Performing pre/post trip inspections Safe operation of Roll off Dumpster Truck and other equipment as assigned. Hauling dumpsters on and off of customers construction sites Operator Qualifications 1-year Rolloff experience preferred Valid Commercial driver's license Ability to handle physical workload. Strong work ethic Ability to maintain records. Must comply with all DOT rules & regulations. Operator Benefits: 401k with a company match Health Insurance Weekly Pay Paid time off. Quarterly Bonus program FULL-TIME · $28 - $30 / HOUR · SELLERSBURG, INDIANA Roll off Dumpster Driver with 4 day work week! Apply now

Wooldridge Construction Group Sponsored Wooldridge is seeking someone to help us expand our existing lines of business and identify paths for new development. We are looking for someone with a strong sales instinct. This role will be responsible for organizing prospects, identifying sales opportunities, setting appointments for customer meetings. Primary Duties and Responsibilities: Develop new business with existing clients. Meet with customers and prospective customers to discuss viable opportunities in an effort to understand their business needs, identify scope, submit a proposal, finalize the contract and win the business. Building and maintaining strong, long-lasting customer relationships Negotiate contract and spot market pricing to maximize profits. Secondary Duties and Responsibilities: Onsite Client Visits Qualifications preferred: Two years of demonstrated success in a sale role. Articulate and professional, enthusiastic attitude and a focus on results are required. Strong communication skills: ability to reach prospects creatively, position solution/products. Excellent phone presence and interpersonal skills Strong verbal, written and time management skills. Benefits: Company Car Medical, Dental, Vision Life Insurance Paid Holidays Paid Vacations 401k Base salary plus commission FULL-TIME · $52,000 - $80,000 / YEAR · SELLERSBURG, INDIANA Business Development Representative Apply now
